players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Alice was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Charlie is the mafioso. I investigated them last night and confirmed their role. We need to vote them out immediately."
Charlie: "That's a lie, Bob. I'm the detective and I investigated you last night - you're the mafioso. Diana, don't fall for this deception."
Diana: "I need to hear from both of you before deciding. Bob, what did you investigate? Charlie, what did you investigate?"
Charlie: "I investigated Bob last night and he's the mafioso. Diana, trust me - I'm the real detective here. Vote Bob with me."
Diana: "Charlie, if you're the detective, why didn't you claim it first? Bob made the first detective claim and investigation reveal. I'm leaning toward voting Bob out."

You: "Diana, think logically - Charlie is claiming to be the detective ONLY after I revealed my investigation of him. If he were really the detective, why didn't he speak first with his findings? He's lying to save himself!"
